item.description:
Hello everyone!
This weekend we have a visit from a national speaker, author, musician, and mystic, Father Peter Bowes. He will be here Thursday through Sunday, giving seminars and meeting with people who are interested in learning about the mystical spiritual path. Kicking of the weekend, on Thursday evening Father Peter will be giving a much-anticipated concert of his amazing folk/rock style music at New Haven's Little Theater, at the end of Lincoln Way (off of Trumbull, between Whitney and Orange). Come on out for a lively, warm, and wonderful evening of great music, with a friendly audience, and a chance to meet Father Peter afterward. He's a very dynamic yet approachable person, and this is an opportunity you won't want to miss.

additional details below.

Hope to see you all there!

In peace,
Rev. Johanna and Rev. David
--------------------------------------------------------------

Singer-songwriter, guitarist, and priest, Father Peter Bowes comes to The Little Theater, bringing New Haven popular Christian rock/folk music filled with spirit and joy. A prolific writer, Father Peter has just released his 10th album and is currently recording the 11th. Join us for this Peace Benefit concert and see why people are raving about the power, beauty and inspiration of his music.

His music is also streaming live on www.Sophia-Records.com

All proceeds from the concert will be donated to The Sophia Peace Center. The Sophia Peace Center is dedicated to world peace and provides free peace-building retreats for re-focusing and inspiring the work of peace and environmental and social health organizations of all kinds. Learn more at www.SophiaPeaceCenter.com.
